20110130140927.000|20110130140929.000|TR0|

20110130140944.500|20110130140947.000|TR0|security; the second objective,
20110130140947.000|20110130140949.000|TR0|you want to facilitate the flow

20110130141237.000|20110130141239.500|TR0|
20110130141239.500|20110130141242.000|TR0|[[GRAB]]
20110130141242.000|20110130141244.500|TR0|
20110130141244.500|20110130141247.000|TR0|After more than a year of

20110130141253.000|20110130141255.000|TR0|Washington are stripping down
20110130141255.000|20110130141257.000|TR0|the nukes.
20110130141257.000|20110130141259.500|TR0|
20110130141259.500|20110130141302.000|TR0|First the State Duma, then the

20110130141407.000|20110130141409.000|TR0|Presidents. But it didn't come

20110130141939.000|20110130141941.000|TR0|dollars. Thus, dollar demand is
20110130141941.000|20110130141943.000|TR0|only growing. I dont believe in
20110130141943.000|20110130141945.000|TR0|spontaneous revolutions - when

20110130142147.000|20110130142149.000|TR0|Orange revolution was in Ukraine
20110130142149.000|20110130142151.000|TR0|or the Rose Revolution with

20110130142153.000|20110130142155.000|TR0|
20110130142155.000|20110130142157.000|TR0|A string of revolutions - some
20110130142157.000|20110130142159.500|TR0|bloodless, some not - rocked the
20110130142159.500|20110130142202.000|TR0|post-soviet space at the
20110130142202.000|20110130142204.500|TR0|beginning of the 21st century.
20110130142204.500|20110130142207.000|TR0|There were a number of common
20110130142207.000|20110130142209.000|TR0|factors - an uprising against
20110130142209.000|20110130142211.000|TR0|the regime, rooted in a popular
20110130142211.000|20110130142213.000|TR0|dissatisfaction with standards
20110130142213.000|20110130142215.000|TR0|of living. Hence the collective
20110130142215.000|20110130142217.000|TR0|name - colored revolutions.
20110130142217.000|20110130142219.500|TR0|Amazingly, their outcomes have
20110130142219.500|20110130142222.000|TR0|been quite similar too.
